summary: A test suite that verifies the Flax implementation of the MBart sequence‑to‑sequence model, checking that it can correctly encode inputs, decode outputs, load pretrained weights, and perform forward passes with caching both with and without attention masks.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the Flax MBart model before it is used in production or research pipelines, reducing risk of errors in translation or multilingual tasks.
